channel.title: Donnie Brasco
channel.desc: While investigating a New York Mafia family from within, an FBI agent faces a moral quandary as he grows close to the organisation's feared hitman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
channel.desc: A subway dispatcher's day is thrown into chaos when four armed men hijack the subway train and take the commuters as hostages. They demand USD 10 million from the mayor as ransom.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Mask of Zorro
channel.desc: Don De la Vega sets out as the Zorro to avenge his wife's murder and find his daughter. During his mission, he is aided by his successor, Alejandro, who also has his own agenda.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Gran Turismo: Based on a True Story
channel.desc: With the help of a mechanic having a tragic past, an avid player of racing video games attempts to become a professional car racer.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Drone
channel.desc: An unexpected confrontation brings a drone operator's hidden life into sharp focus, setting off a tense moral standoff with devastating emotional stakes.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vincent N Roxxy
channel.desc: An unlikely romance develops between Vincent, a loner, and Roxxy, a rebel, while they are on the run to save their lives. However, their violent past seems to catch up with them wherever they go.
